tasks.label: docker compose up
tasks.command: APP_ENV=dev op run --env-file='./.env' docker compose up

tasks.label: docker compose up build
tasks.command: APP_ENV=dev op run --env-file='./.env' -- docker compose up --build

tasks.label: docker compose down
tasks.command: APP_ENV=dev op run --env-file='./.env' -- docker compose down

tasks.label: docker compose down remove all
tasks.command: APP_ENV=dev op run --env-file='./.env' -- docker compose down -v --remove-orphans --rmi all

windows.command: start-sleep -seconds 5; cd ./api; pnpm build; pnpm generate:client:dev;
